uv19:37: abalāśva iva bhadrāśvaṁ hitvā yāti sumedhasam ।।
uv19:39: hrīniṣevī hi puruṣaḥ prājño yaḥ susamāhitaḥ ।
uv19:41: sarvapāpaṁ jahāty eṣa bhadrāśvo hi kaśām iva ।।
uv19:43: dānto vai samitiṁ yāti dāntaṁ rājādhirohati ।
uv19:47: yo hy aśvaṁ damayej jānyam ājāneyaṁ ca saindhavam ।
uv19:49: kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmā dāntas tato varam ।। [i]
uv19:51: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam ।
uv19:53: kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।। [ii]
uv19:55: na hy asau tena yānena tāṁ bhūmim adhigacchati ।
uv19:57: ātmanā hi sudāntena kṣipraṁ śāntiṁ nigacchati ।। [i]
uv19:59: na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet ।
uv19:61: yām ātmanā sudāntena dānto dāntena gacchati ।। [ii]
uv19:63: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam ।
uv19:65: kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।।
uv19:67: na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet ।
uv19:69: yām ātmanā sudāntena bhave duḥkhasya pāragaḥ ।।
uv19:71: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam ।
uv19:73: kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।।
uv19:75: na hy asau tena yānena tāṁ bhūmim adhigacchati ।
uv19:77: ātmanā hi sudāntena sarvās tyajati durgatīḥ ।। [i]
uv19:79: na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet ।
uv19:81: yām ātmanā sudāntena sarvāṁ tyajati durgatīḥ ।। [ii]
uv19:83: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam ।
uv19:85: kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।।
uv19:87: na hy asau tena yānena tāṁ bhūmim adhigacchati ।
uv19:89: ātmanā hi sudāntena sarvāṁ chinatti bandhanam ।। [i]
uv19:91: na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet ।
uv19:93: yām ātmanā sudāntena sarvāṁ chindati bandhanam ।। [ii]
uv19:95: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam ।
uv19:97: kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।।
uv19:99: na hy asau tena yānena tāṁ bhūmim adhigacchati ।
uv19:103: na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet ।
uv19:107: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam ।
uv19:109: kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।।
uv19:111: na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet ।
uv19:113: yām ātmanā sudāntena sarvāṁ jahāti saṁpadam ।।
uv19:115: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam ।
uv19:117: kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।।
uv19:119: na hy asau tena yānena tāṁ bhūmim adhigacchati ।
uv19:123: na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet ।
uv19:127: ātmānam eva damayed bhadrāśvam iva sārathiḥ ।
uv19:131: ātmaiva hy ātmano nāthaḥ ātmā śaraṇam ātmanaḥ ।
